item.title: Authentication Mechanisms
item.description: This article is all about different authentication/authorisation mechanisms such as Basic Auth, SSO, tokens etc.

item.title: ðŸ“š Kerberos
item.description: Structure The Flow - Wanna talk - Ok. Let’s talk. Here is my public key. Here are the protocols that I support.

item.title: Credential Delegation
item.description: Imagine, I have keys to my place. I also have a friend, and I want this friend to take care of my cat when I am out of town. I can make a copy of my keys and give them to my friend. What I did is called delegating the access credentials.
